original_text: But you have said, “I will give you many good things. I will give you so many descendants that nobody will be able to count them. They will be as many as the pieces of sand on the shore of the sea.” ’
korean_text: 주께서 말씀하시기를 내가 반드시 네게 은혜를 베풀어 네 씨로 바다의 셀 수 없는 모래와 같이 많게 하리라 하셨나이다

sentences.original_text: I will give you many good things
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너에게 많은 좋은 것들을 주겠다

sentences.original_text: I will give you so many descendants
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너에게 그렇게 많은 자손을 주겠다

sentences.original_text: that nobody will be able to count them
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그들을 셀 수 없을 만큼

sentences.original_text: They will be as many as the pieces of sand
on the shore of the sea
